name: cryptonote-universal-pool-list
description: The most comprehensive list of cryptonote-universal-pool's instances.

scripts.build: rimraf lib && babel src/back -d lib && webpack --mode=production
scripts.w:back:edc: CURRENCY=edollar nodemon --watch src --ignore src/front --exec babel-node src/back/index.js
scripts.w:back:itns: CURRENCY=intensecoin nodemon --watch src --ignore src/front --exec babel-node src/back/index.js
scripts.w:back:xlc: CURRENCY=leviarcoin nodemon --watch src --ignore src/front --exec babel-node src/back/index.js
scripts.w:back:fno: CURRENCY=fonero nodemon --watch src --ignore src/front --exec babel-node src/back/index.js
scripts.w:back:sumo: CURRENCY=sumokoin nodemon --watch src --ignore src/front --exec babel-node src/back/index.js

author: Thibault Morin
